TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 12
TEI.2.document_title: Alexander Yhary to Stephen F. Austin, 02-02-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Alexander Yhary to Austin, Laredo, February 2, 1828. Sending copy of general tariff, and asking for certain papers to be used in Austin's interest vtith General Terán. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 12

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Alexander Yhary to Austin, Laredo, February 2, 1828. Sending copy of general tariff, and asking for certain papers to be used in Austin's interest vtith General Terán. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Laredo*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="02-02-1828">February 2, 1828*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
